info.author: David MacCarthy
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v3 (GPLv3)
info.description:
An educational programming package for Python 3.4+. Inspired by Scratch and Processing, sc8pr's aim is to make it easy for new and experienced Python programmers to create animations, games, and other graphics-based programs.

Features include:
* a simple, event-driven approach to creating interactive animations
* sprite management
* physics-based collisions
* video effects / transitions
* a selection of GUI controls
* curve plotting
* robotics simulator
info.keywords: graphics animation sprite gui robotics pygame educational
info.name: sc8pr
info.summary: A simple framework for new and experienced Python programmers to create animations, games, robotics simulations, and other graphics-based programs
